text: Mohammad Amir Khan (born 29 December 1993) is an Indian field hockey player who plays as a forward. He represented India at the 2009 Men's Hockey Junior World Cup and made his senior team debut later that year at the age of 16. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at Hockey India Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Field hockey players from Allahabad Category:Indian male field hockey players
title: Mohammad Amir Khan
